column1: Must be great to be a person who can be so far removed from the effects of racial fetishism that you can so ignorantly deny its effect and how much it matters, but for the people who are consistently treated as sex objects based on uncontrollable things like their sex or race, it does.
Very cool! you did a pretty poor job shaving her though

I know, friend. It is an old, worn out meme.
So uh, chinchillas aren't supposed to be that big, right? They're speedy, hoppy little fellas and gizmo doesn't look the type.
